SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am52
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am52.model.game

Class GameManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am52.model.game.GameManager
public class GameManager extends Object
The model of the entire game. It creates every object needed to play a game and provides all the information needed to the View via Controller.

      The winner or the list of the winners. Could be one or more, in case of a tie.

    • setPlayerChosenObject

      public void setPlayerChosenObject(String nickname, int objectiveId)
      Method used to set the chosen secret objective
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player to set
      objectiveId - the objective chosen
      Throws:
      GameException - The phase is not correct
      PlayerException - The objective cannot be chosen by the player or has been already chosen

    • placeStarterCard

      public void placeStarterCard(String nickname, int cardId, int side)
      Place a given starter card using the given face
      Parameters:
      nickname - The player who place the card
      cardId - The ID of the card
      side - The face used by the card
      Throws:
      GameException - The phase is not correct
      PlayingBoardException - The Playing Board of the player has already been instantiated or the player doesn't have the given starter card

    • placeCard

      public void placeCard(int cardId, int face, BoardSlot slot)
      Place a given generic card in a certain position
      Parameters:
      cardId - The ID of the card
      face - The face used by the card, (0) if front, (1) if back
      slot - The position of the card
      Throws:
      GameException - The phase is not correct
      CardException - The card doesn't exist
      PlayerException - The card isn't in the player's hand or the face does not belong to the card
      PlayingBoardException - There aren't enough resources or items on the board

    • drawResourceCard

      public void drawResourceCard()
      Draw a random card from the resource deck
      Throws:
      GameException - The phase is not correct
      DeckException - There are no more items in the dealer
      IllegalStateException - There are no more items in the list
      PlayerException - The hand of the player has already 3 cards or adding a duplicate card

    • drawGoldCard

      public void drawGoldCard()
      Draw a random card from the gold deck
      Throws:
      GameException - The phase is not correct
      DeckException - There are no more items in the dealer
      IllegalStateException - There are no more items in the list
      PlayerException - The hand of the player has already 3 cards or adding a duplicate card

    • takeResourceCard

      public int takeResourceCard(int cardId)
      Take the visible resource card on the board and draw another card to fill the gap
      Parameters:
      cardId - The ID of the visible card

    • takeGoldCard

      public int takeGoldCard(int cardId)
      Take the visible gold card on the board and draw another card to fill the gap
      Parameters:
      cardId - The ID of the visible card

    • leaveGame

      public void leaveGame(String nickname)
      Report a player disconnected
      Parameters:
      nickname - The ID of the disconnected player

    • peekNextCard

      public int peekNextCard(DrawType drawType)
